main.name: Hemanth Sai kumar Challapalli
main.description: we are the creators of modern world
main.bio: As a data science graduate with a Master's in Data Science and a robust foundation in computer science, I am proficient in utilizing analytical tools, programming languages, and frameworks to extract valuable insights from data. I have hands-on experience in developing and implementing machine learning models within my projects. Additionally, I am skilled in data cleaning, wrangling, and adept at leveraging deep learning techniques for complex problem-solving.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

work.title: CHROME EXTENSION DEVELOPER
work.description: Developed innovative Chrome Extensions, leveraging PHP, SQL, JavaScript, and other programming capabilities to enhance browser functionalities. Conducted rigorous testing of programs and databases, identifying, and resolving issues promptly to ensure the seamless operation of software applications.  Designed and implemented software applications for websites, aligning solutions with analyzed requirements and adhering to industry technical standards.  Applied a multi-faceted skill set in PHP, SQL, and JavaScript to create effective and efficient Chrome Extensions, meeting project deadlines and exceeding client expectations.

work.title: FULL STACK DEVELOPER
work.description: Spearheaded the development of a successful e-commerce website, managing end-to-end implementation in React and ensuring seamless integration of frontend and backend components. Utilized site analytics to define key success metrics, enhancing project planning and contributing to the creation of well-organized React requirements based on customer needs. Reviewed, debugged, and corrected code issues, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and contributing to the continuous improvement of software implementations. Worked collaboratively on diverse customer projects, showcasing adaptability and flexibility in handling different requirements and project scopes. Conducted a comprehensive analysis of existing software implementations, identifying areas for enhancement and implementing strategic improvements to optimize performance.

projects.title: Visualization Project on MC2
description1: Utilized Tableau and D3.js for interactive and insightful data visualization.
Analyzed anomalies in waterway samples dataset & proposing changes in the sampling approach.

projects.title: Food Vision 101
projects.category: Food Vision | Python | TensorFlow | Computer Vision | Deep Learning
description1: Leveraged the pretrained EfficientNetB0 model with pretrained weights to surpass the benchmarks set by the DeepFood paper.
Achieved an impressive accuracy of 80.1%, showcasing the effectiveness of the combined approach in enhancing food image recognition.

projects.title: Skimlit NLP Project
projects.category: NLP | LSTM | spaCy | Positional Embedding | Word Embedding
description1: Achieved notable success with the sixth model, incorporating positional embedding with both character and token embeddings, achieving a remarkable accuracy of 84.2% after six epochs.

projects.title: Bitcoin Price Prediction
description1: Developed a robust training mechanism for forecasting Bitcoin prices, demonstrating expertise in handling time-series data and updating models with new information.
Showcased a comprehensive understanding of model retraining with new data and the intricacies of forecasting in the dynamic realm of cryptocurrency prices.

projects.title: Data Professional Survey Report
description1: Executed a Power BI visualization project using a professional survey dataset. Developed a dynamic dashboard report, translating raw data into actionable insights. Demonstrated proficiency in Power BI, data analytics, and report creation.
